title: Kieran Hayler brags about cosy movie night with Bunny and Jett as he shares sweet bed snap

Kieran Hayler had Bunny and Jett for the night.

And the dad, 32, gave his fans a glimpse into their cosy sleepover as they enjoyed a family move night on Wednesday.

The former stripper, who shares Jett, six, and Bunny, five, with Katie Price , was clearly thrilled to be spending the evening with his two children.

Kieran posted a series of adorable snaps to his Instagram stories with the caption: "Movies in bed", followed by a heart emoji.

The film night clearly done the trick as Kieran then shared a sweet clip of the two young children fast asleep and tucked into bed.

(Image: Instagram)

He whispered: "I don't know if you can see but Jett and Bunny are flat out asleep."

At the beginning of September, Kieran started a war with the children's mum, Katie, as he demanded full custody of Bunny and Jett.

Following Katie's recent toyboy fling with builder Charles Drury , Kieran liked a scathing tweet about the former glamour model.

(Image: Instagram)

The tweet read: "If I was you I'd go to court for FULL CUSTODY of those children. Absolute disgrace them being subjected to another man "daddy" in their lives.

"Seriously worrying. Also this modeling milarkey. I'd get the courts to step in and stop them being used on social media the way they are. I feel very sorry for them."

The Mirror approached Kieran Hayler for further comment at the time.

Katie found love with her ex-husband Kieran when they were first put in touch on online chat service Blackberry Messenger in November 2012.

(Image: Getty Images)

It was a whirlwind romance as the couple were married in the Bahamas in January 2013, just shortly after he got down on one knee on Christmas Day 2012.

They renewed their vows in October 2016 but their romance wasn't meant to last as Katie dumped Kieran for good in 2018.

Kieran has since been going steady with Michelle Penticost whom he went public with in August last year.

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

According to reports, Kieran's girlfriend Michelle has a tumultuous relationship with party girl Katie.

The reality star famously had a bust up with Michelle in the school playground last year, which left her slapped with a restraining order .

Katie was reportedly unable to attend her daughter's fifth birthday bash because she isn't allowed to approach her ex's partner, or have any contact with her over the next five years.
description: Katie's estranged husband Kieran shared adorable Instagram stories as he spent the evening cuddled up to his little ones
